author: benjeyyy
content:
after eip-7251 can we go directly from 0x00 credentials to 0x02 credentials (without setting a 0x01 withdrawal address) to benefit from compounding rewards?
so lets say there is 1 validator with 35ETH. I want this validator to go 0x02 so that it earns compounding rewards.
will there be a tutorial on how this is supposed to work?
